children.markdown:
[![](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2007/01/360455782_92600df9f6_m.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/travel_weekly/360455782/ "photo sharing") [Maddy Wood from Spannerworks](http://www.flickr.com/photos/travel_weekly/360455782/) Originally uploaded by [Travel Weekly Gallery](http://www.flickr.com/people/travel_weekly/).
Speaking of my colleagues from [Travel Weekly](http://www.travelweekly.co.uk) (whose blog was the source of the quote in my last post), I just love [this gallery of the best dressed attendees](http://www.flickr.com/photos/travel_weekly/sets/72157594484723179/) from the Travel Weekly Globe Awards that they’ve stuck up on Flickr. What a fashionable lot the travel industry are. Clearly far more [Louis Vuitton](http://www.louisvuitton.com/) luggage that backpacker chic…
